# Byungsker Log

> A technical blog by Byungsker (이병우), focusing on product-led development, software engineering, and startup insights.

## About This Site

Byungsker Log is a Korean technical blog that shares insights on:
- Software Development
- Product-Led Development
- Startup Experience
- Web Technologies (Next.js, React, TypeScript)

## Author

- Name: 이병우 (Byungsker)
- Role: Software Developer
- Focus: Product-Led Development
- Website: https://byungskerlog.vercel.app

## Main Sections

- Home: https://byungskerlog.vercel.app/
- Posts: https://byungskerlog.vercel.app/posts
- Tags: https://byungskerlog.vercel.app/tags
- About: https://byungskerlog.vercel.app/about

## Content Topics

This blog primarily covers:
1. Software development best practices
2. Product development strategies
3. Startup experiences and lessons learned
4. Technical tutorials and guides
5. Web development with modern frameworks

## Language

Primary language: Korean (한국어)
Technical terms: English

## Contact

For inquiries or collaboration, please visit the About page or connect through the social links on the website.

https://byungskerlog.vercel.app/sitemap.xml
